Wednesday(4) === 04/09/2025
<script> Yesterday(3) onStart START 
Numerology, Date, Task === NAN
console.log(3)
</script>

<script>Today(4) onUpdate UPDATE
Numerology, Date
Task = (4)
onEOD === EOD + Task.onUpdate
console.log(4)
</script>

<script>Tomorrow(5) onStop STOP
Numerology, Date
Task = (4) + (5)
onEOD === EOD + Task.onStop STOP
onUpdate UPDATE
onEOD EOD
console.log(4) + (5)
</script>
